nodes.text: The Empire Strikes Back Weekly was the second title of Marvel UK's Star Wars comic series. (The series' previous title was Star Wars Weekly.) The weekly series reprinted stories from Marvel Comics' American Star Wars series, along with several original tales. The American comic's issues were usually split into smaller segments and appeared over a number of issues.
The numbering system continued from the previous title. The series became The Empire Strikes Back Monthly after issue #139.
